column1: The Pit Room////As a tourist in town
column2: I found the Pit Room off Yelp.  When we first walked in
column3: I didn't really know what to expect.  It was packed
column4: but I wasn't expecting it to be a counter service type restaurant (sans waitstaff).  Anyways
column5: we took our  Lyft there so we were eating there regardless.
